name: intelagent-sales-agent
description: AI-powered B2B sales automation platform with integrated enrichment

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:enrichment" "npm run start:api" "npm run start:dashboard"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install && cd "../Intelagent Enrichment" && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run prisma:setup
scripts.prisma:setup: cd api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev && cd "../Intelagent Enrichment" && npx prisma generate

author: Intelagent Studios
